sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; function TravelPlan() { // 状态管理：当前显示的天数 const [activeDay, setActiveDay] = useState(1); // 旅游计划数据 const travelData = [ { day: 1, title: '深圳 - 南宁', departure: '深圳', destination: '南宁', distance: '约650公里', duration: '7-8小时', accommodation: '南宁', activities: ['休整，适应旅程'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=深圳到南宁' }, { day: 2, title: '南宁 - 昆明', departure: '南宁', destination: '昆明', distance: '约750公里', duration: '8-9小时', accommodation: '昆明', activities: ['翠湖公园散步'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=南宁到昆明' }, { day: 3, title: '昆明休闲游', departure: '昆明', destination: '昆明', distance: '市内游览', duration: '全天', accommodation: '昆明', activities: [ '滇池海埂公园看海鸥', '云南民族村浅逛', '品尝过桥米线' ], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=昆明景点' }, { day: 4, title: '昆明 - 大理', departure: '昆明', destination: '大理', distance: '约350公里', duration: '4-5小时', accommodation: '大理古城或洱海边', activities: ['傍晚洱海边散步'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=昆明到大理' }, { day: 5, title: '大理休闲游', departure: '大理', destination: '大理', distance: '市内游览', duration: '全天', accommodation: '大理', activities: [ '洱海生态廊道骑行或散步', '喜洲古镇体验扎染', '品尝喜洲粑粑、烤乳扇' ], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=大理景点' }, { day: 6, title: '大理 - 丽江', departure: '大理', destination: '丽江', distance: '约180公里', duration: '3-4小时（含休息）', accommodation: '丽江古城或束河古镇', activities: ['傍晚古城闲逛'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=大理到丽江' }, { day: 7, title: '丽江休闲游', departure: '丽江', destination: '丽江', distance: '市内游览', duration: '全天', accommodation: '丽江', activities: [ '束河古镇体验茶马文化', '丽江古城轻度探索', '品尝丽江粑粑、鸡豆凉粉' ], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=丽江景点' }, { day: 8, title: '丽江 - 西昌', departure: '丽江', destination: '西昌', distance: '约280公里', duration: '5-6小时（山路较多）', accommodation: '西昌', activities: ['傍晚邛海休闲广场散步'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=丽江到西昌' }, { day: 9, title: '西昌 - 贵阳', departure: '西昌', destination: '贵阳', distance: '约700公里', duration: '8-9小时', accommodation: '贵阳', activities: ['休整，准备返程'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=西昌到贵阳' }, { day: 10, title: '贵阳 - 深圳', departure: '贵阳', destination: '深圳', distance: '约900公里', duration: '10-11小时', accommodation: '深圳', activities: ['旅程结束'], mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/?q=贵阳到深圳' } ]; // 获取当前天的计划 const currentPlan = travelData.find(plan => plan.day === activeDay); return (
